KEDO senior experts delegation leaves
articles.content:
KEDO senior experts delegation leaves 
     Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- A senior experts delegation of the Korean Peninsula Energy Development Organization which came to discuss the issues related to the construction of the Light Water Reactor project, left Pyongyang today.
